title: git-chipper - batch delete local branches
author: noshbrinken
content: readme.md git-chipper interactive cli batch deleting local branches.install$ npm install --global git-chippercli$ git-chipper --help interactive cli batch deleting local branches. usage $ git-chipper options -, --all select branches. -f, --force force delete selected branches. -n, -- select branches named this comma-separated list. examples $ git-chipper # ... follow terminal prompt instructions $ git-chipper --=foo,bar,baz # ... follow terminal prompt instructionslicensemit Â© max hallinan
